header.title: Syntax_Tools User's Guide

description.p: Syntax_Tools contains modules for handling abstract Erlang syntax trees, in a way that is compatible with the "parse trees" of the STDLIB module erl_parse, together with utilities for reading source files in unusual ways and pretty-printing syntax trees. Also included is an amazing module merger and renamer called Igor, as well as an automatic code-cleaner.
